/usr/bin/gcc  -msse3 -Wall -Wextra -mcx16 -O3 -DNDEBUG  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/spm_norm_tests.dir/spm_norm_tests.c.o  -o spm_norm_tests  -L/home/josep_maria/Kratos/libs -Wl,-rpath,/home/josep_maria/Kratos/libs -lhwloc /home/josep_maria/Kratos/libs/libscotch.a -lscotcherrexit -lpthread -lz -lm -lrt ../libspm.a libspm_test.a ../libspm.a -lhwloc /home/josep_maria/Kratos/libs/libscotch.a -lscotcherrexit -lpthread -lz -llapacke -lopenblas -lm -lrt
